name: Sunsilk Black Shine Shampoo
description:
With Sunsilk Stunning Black Shine get long lasting shine from day to night.  Sunsilk Stunning Black Shine shampoo is now New Outside & wow Inside. Its coolest black shampoo pack comes with an easy to handle grip. Enriched with Amla pearl complex, this formula moisturizes and nourishes your black hair making it look fuller and shinier. Prevents dullness and restores a healthy lustrous look. Sunsilk Black Shine is enriched with amla pearl complex. It nourishes hair and works from the first wash to give you shinier hair.
 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
